txt.en: Do not let a torch-bearer reach the Tree

'The Uruk-hai are attacking from the cave across the river. They carry torches and are attempting to light the Tree on fire. We must stop the torch-bearers from reaching the Tree.\n\n'Protect the Tree at all cost! Get ready!'
'Well done, [placeholder], but the Uruk-hai will be back! Hurry quickly and make sure all of the guardposts are safe, then report back to Maugan!\n\n'Saruman is here.'
You arrived at the western guardpost in time to defend it from attack.
You have done all you can to stop the Uruk-hai
A torch-bearer has reached the Tree
Defend the western guardpost from the Uruk-hai
Guard Ambras is at the western guardpost of the Pristine Glade.\n\nGuard Ambras has asked you to stop all the torch-bearers from reaching the Tree.
Talk to Guard Ambras at the western guardpost
Guard Ambras is at the western guardpost of the Pristine Glade.\n\nThe Uruk-hai are re-doubling their efforts. You should speak with Guard Ambras again and find out what can be done to stop them.
